thread.title: Biagio Lamberti

author: Biagio Lamberti
title: Biagio Lamberti
text: Very happy with this deal. The code worked as expected in my HTC ONE wile in Italy. We fallow the directions and once the sim card of the Italian provider was inserted we enter the code and the phone immediately start working with wi-fi. The name of the italian provider was not on the list, so it had to be entered manually in the phone settings, but then the cell and data service work well too. I would recommend to friends and family. Best service as the cheapest price. Thanks
